name: Clumsy Robots
description:
A fun, challenging puzzle game all about robots that can't stop bumping into walls. Try to help guide the robots through levels with their built in sets of instructions. Featuring:

  • 36 unique, puzzling levels!
  • Wordless tutorials!
  • A full exploration of the unique interactions between robots!
  • Simple to understand instructions sets!
  • Beautifully awful artwork courtesy of paint 3D!

This is the first game I've released on this scale (admittedly still not THAT big), hope you enjoy it! The art is bad because I made it alone in paint, but I put a lot of effort into the design and I hope it shows! Highly suggest checking out the controls section before diving into the game.
